mapper.select: SELECT admin_user.*, role_id, role_name FROM admin_user JOIN admin_role_user ON role_user_user_id=user_id JOIN admin_role ON role_id=role_user_role_id FROM admin_user where user_phone = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM admin_user LEFT JOIN admin_role_user ON role_user_user_id=user_id WHERE role_user_role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
